name: Dice Deflectors
description:
Hello! My name is Slumber. An aspiring game developer and Youtuber! This is my first time participating in the GMTK Game Jam, so I'm excited to see how I do! This game was based off a tabletop game I've created two months ago about bouncing dice. It was quite a surprise to see the theme and recalling that game.

 I can't wait to see how everybody likes the game! I'll create a devlog of the experience making a game in such a short time. Good Luck to everybody else in this game jam!
